mapper.select: /* AuthMapper.selectMemberUser */ select op_user.user_id /* 사용자아이디 */ , op_user.user_pwd as password /* 사용자비밀번호 */ , op_user.user_nm as user_name /* 사용자명 */ , op_user.email /* 이메일 */ , op_user_op.mobile as phone /* 휴대전화 */ , op_user_op.birthday as birth_date /* 생년월일 */ , op_user_op.wp_nm as company_nm /* 직장명 */ , op_user_op.cp_num as business_num /* 사업자등록번호 */ , op_user_op.corp_num as corporation_num /* 법인등록번호 */ from op_user op_user join op_user_option op_user_op on op_user.user_id = op_user_op.user_id where op_user.user_id = #{userId} and op_user.user_state = '1001'
